1: <pb/><t>Mamin, a en chin col in ba, c'am bak'in chi el in q'uixwil oj.</t>
2: <t>Colin elok, colin el yul k'ab eb wajc'ul, yujtol tojol ach. Ab wal tzet chi wala', cax chin a colon elok.</t>
3: <t>Ocan in nach'enok yin wenelok. Ocan in corral ch'enok yet colbalba. ¡Ach axca in nach'en ayji, axca in cuartel ayji!</t>
4: <pb/><t>Ach in Diosal, colin el yul k'ab eb yobtakwom, c'al yul k'ab eb mak'om cam anima c'al eb yaxc'ayinak.</t>
5: <t>Mamin Jehová Wajawil, toc'alta' yip ach in c'ul yintax wach'ejal.</t>
6: <t>Yettaxc'al max in alji yin in txutx, a en chi wi wip. Ach max quin ak' aljok. Ok ach wak'c'al bitnajok.</t>
7: <pb/><t>Xiwil mac max jay nabal yuj max yil eb tzet wayji, yujtol ach chin a colc'altek.</t>
8: <t>Masanil c'ual, cac'al ti' walon watx' k'anej yin a mimanbilal.</t>
9: <t>Manchak in entaknej el yet icham inxa. Manchak in a bekcan yet c'amxa wip.</t>
10: <t>A eb ajc'ul oc win, eb chi yochej c'ul chin yak' camok, chi waj eb yetbi, cax chi lajtinen ba eb win.</t>
11: <t>Chi yalon eb: ¡Uktejek, mitx'ek! ¡Tokwal ayto oc Dios yetok, tokwal ayto mactxel ok colon el tinani'! ẍi eb.</t>
12: <pb/><t>Ach in Diosal, manchak ach el najat in c'atan. Titan yin ayman, cax ocan wetok.</t>
13: <t>A eb chi oc ajc'ulal win, camokab eb yin q'uixwilal. Canokab eb yin c'am yelapnok, eb chi ochen chin etaxi.</t>
14: <t>Axa in xin, yip achc'alta' in c'ul yin junjun txolan. Ok in ajc'al can ach in bitneni.</t>
15: <t>Masanil c'ual, ok walil yabixal a tojolal, c'al a colwal, caxc'al mi c'am chi nachaj el wuj masanil.</t>
16: <t>Mamin Jehová Jajawil, a juntzan mimek tzet yetal max onej, a' ok in bitnej. Ok walil abixal tol asannej ach ay a tojolal.</t>
17: <pb/><t>Ach in Diosal, yintax uninal max in a cuyoni. Ipantoc'al walon el a mimek unben tinani'.</t>
18: <t>Ach in Diosal, manchak in a bekcanok, mawal yet icham inxa yet sakxa xil in jolom. Oktoc'al je' wuj walon el yabixal a miman ipejal bay eb ok aljokc'al yet bak'in.</t>
19: <pb/><t>Ach Dios, yelxac'al miman a tojolc'ulalil. Chic'al apnitac'al bay satcan. Mimek tzet yetal mayal onej. ¡Tok ayto wal mactxel axca wal ach!</t>
20: <t>Caxc'al xiwilxa tzet yetal max quin oni, c'al yailal max ak' ayin, palta okto ak' wiquisal yin aq'uil junelxa. Ok in e ajtek yul c'ul tx'otx' tx'otx'.</t>
21: <t>Ok acan oc tz'ak in mimanbilal axa in a mimanc'ulnen tu'.</t>
22: <pb/><t>Axa ayin ti', ok in bitnok ayach, yuj chak' yun tzet chala', cax ok walon yuj diosalil yin arpail c'al yin wajabil, ach in Diosal, ach ton Diosal ach Israel.</t>
23: <t>Ok aj waw yin tzalojc'ulal yet ok ach in bitnej, yujtol max in a colo'.</t>
24: <t>Ok walil a tojolal masanil c'ual. A eb chi yochej ay tzet chin oni, max ayc'ay eb, max cancan eb yin mimek q'uixwilal.</t>
